certificates.title: Sence
certificates.description: Sence certified through the Talento Digital para Chile program as a FrontEnd developer specialized in the Vue.js framework

about.title: About me
about.description: Programming and Systems Analysis graduate, looking for my first professional opportunity in web applications and software development. I am very passionate about technology and programming, and I'm always looking forward to deepen my knowledge and improve my skills. I love working in teams and mutual support to achieve common goals. I also work as a Sound Technician oriented to sound reinforcement, so I have very sharpened skills towards problem solving under dynamic situations.
